name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabcut â€” Amazon vs TikTok Price Comparison

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabcut helps you find the best deals by comparing prices of products between Amazon and similar items on TikTok.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The price comparison tool produced by Tabcut provides price comparison services for Amazon users. 
You can view the price, commission, sales volume of similar TikTok goods by clicking the [TikTok Price comparison] button. 
The tool presents [TikTok price comparison] buttons in three places: (1) the search results page that users display when they search for Amazon products by product title; (2) the product details page; and (3) Amazon's official list of recommended products based on users' browsing habits. 
In these three places, if the price of the commodity is marked, the [TikTok] button can be seen below the commodity price. 
The tool can view up to 5 TikTok-like items. 
For more information, click the "Open Tabcut for more" button to visit the Tabcut data platform for more content.
